enhancedContent.overview: A comprehensive Notion-based student planner designed to streamline academic life with aesthetic green and matcha-themed interfaces. This all-in-one system helps students organize coursework, track habits, manage finances, and maintain study productivity through a visually appealing and functional workspace.

features: Brain dump space for mental clarity

problemsSolved: Scattered academic information across multiple apps and platforms
Difficulty balancing coursework with personal habits and lifestyle
Lack of motivation due to boring, clinical planning interfaces
Poor visibility into assignment deadlines and exam schedules
Inability to track study progress and productivity patterns
solutionsBenefits: Centralizes all student needs in one aesthetically pleasing workspace
Provides visual motivation through beautiful matcha and anime-inspired designs
Offers comprehensive tracking from academics to personal wellness
Enables better time management through integrated scheduling tools
Supports both academic success and personal growth habits
idealFor: College and university students seeking organized academic management
Visual learners who prefer aesthetic, themed planning interfaces
Students juggling multiple courses and extracurricular activities
Notion users looking for a comprehensive student life solution
Anyone wanting to combine productivity with wellness tracking
notRecommendedFor: Users unfamiliar with Notion's basic functionality (steep learning curve)
Students preferring simple, minimalist planning tools (feature-heavy design)
whatsIncluded: Complete Notion template with two theme variations
Integrated habit, budget, and assignment tracking systems
Study session timer and cafÃ© discovery tools
Setup examples and template structure guidance

faqs.question: Can I customize this template?
faqs.answer: Yes, after duplicating the template you can fully customize it by removing example content, adding your own courses, and modifying the design elements to match your preferences.

faqs.question: Do I need Notion AI to use this?
faqs.answer: No, this template works with any Notion account and doesn't require AI features or premium subscriptions to function properly.

faqs.question: How complex is the setup?
faqs.answer: Setup is beginner-friendly - simply duplicate the template and replace the example content with your own courses and information. No technical configuration required.

faqs.question: Is this updated for 2026?
faqs.answer: The template uses Notion's current features and database structures, making it compatible with ongoing Notion updates and suitable for current academic years.

faqs.question: What if I need help?
faqs.answer: Support is available through email contact with the creators, and the template includes examples and guidance to help you get started effectively.
